pages.title: Core: Shock Rifle
pages.text: The $(2)Shock Rifle Core$() is a $(3)semi-automatic$() core that delivers a burst of anti-photons towards a target. The concussive effect of anti-photon annihilation causes this core to pack a serious punch, providing opportunities to disengage if necessary.

pages.title: Shock Rifle Core
pages.text: Interestingly, anti-photons interact with the electromagnetic fields generated by the motion of charged plasmas.
